entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:00 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -16.3Â°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 late in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
